channel.title: Anti ddos help asap
channel.description:
Theres a guy on my server that i think doesnt deserve his rank so i demoted him then he said he would ddos us if i didnt give back so i did, how can i anti ddos my server so i can ipban him
Btw yes i did set it at 1 ip per connection

item.title: Anti ddos help asap
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

if i ipbaned him he still could ddos right?

Read full topic

item.title: Anti ddos help asap
item.dc:creator: @KrypitcRc KrypitcRc
item.description:
@KrypitcRc wrote:

[quote=“Woopzpkedu, post:4, topic:379412”][quote author=KrypitcRc link=topic=475259.msg3475389#msg3475389 date=1295655461]
If you just wanna IP him search for his char file copy the IP into the IP ban file?
[/quote]or just do ::ipban (name) if u got the command[/quote]

I think the server is completely down due to the ddos, so he can’t do that.

Read full topic

You Cant Always Believe Some If They Said There Going To DDOS Tbh…

But You Should Still Have An Anit-DDOS always
Soz If I Had One I Wud Of Gave It
